Posts.Content: May 16, 2012 07:27PM FioreTD wrote: Thank you so much! It's amazing how much better I feel by reading these boards. I keep telling my family that I'm not worried so it's nice to share my concerns here. You're suggestions are very helpful. I will write down everything she says because I do prefer to go by myself.  I really think I don't have anything serious but what worries me is that my PCP referred to a BS right away before even doing the US. It makes me think she is more worried than she pretended to be. Also, they gave me an appointmet very soon which is very rare haha.. Wow, I'm really overthinking everything! However, I'm very thankful she didn't ingnore me.  Thanks again for your encouragement and comforting words!

I hope the BS gives me some answers.  hugs!
